alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Johnson and southeastern Marion Counties through 615 PM EDT ... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greenwood, or 11 miles south of Indianapolis, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Indianapolis, Greenwood, and Southport around 555 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 96 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
